name: Alchemist's Greeting
oracle_text:
Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Impressive."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Backwoods Survivalists
oracle_text: Delirium — Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.

name: Bloodbriar
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.
flavor_text:
"There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back."
—Nissa Revane

name: Bold Impaler
oracle_text: {2}{R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.

name: Boon of Emrakul
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.
flavor_text: All around Emrakul, life re-formed in her image.

name: Borrowed Grace
oracle_text:
Escalate {1}{W} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Borrowed Hostility
oracle_text:
Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Borrowed Malevolence
oracle_text:
Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Brazen Wolves
oracle_text: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

name: Cathar's Shield
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"A leader can inspire courage, but it is the smiths and healers who truly keep hope alive."
—Thalia, heretic cathar

name: Cemetery Recruitment
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.
flavor_text: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."

name: Certain Death
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.

name: Chittering Host
oracle_text:
Haste
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Chittering Host enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.

name: Choking Restraints
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Choking Restraints: Exile enchanted creature.

name: Contingency Plan
oracle_text: Surveil 5. (Look at the top five cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavor_text:
"Improvisation is for those who failed to prepare."
—Jace Beleren

name: Convolute
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text:
"There's no sense arguing with insanity."
—Levana, Midnight Duelist

name: Crossroads Consecrator
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."

name: Cultist's Staff
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The head of the staff doubles as a brand to anoint the newly inducted.

name: Dawn Gryff
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: After facing so many horrors, the survivors of Videns parish couldn't comprehend the hope that the gryff represented.

name: Desperate Sentry
oracle_text:
When Desperate Sentry dies, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
Delirium — Desperate Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Displace
oracle_text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
flavor_text: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"

name: Distemper of the Blood
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Drag Under
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.

name: Enlightened Maniac
oracle_text: When Enlightened Maniac enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
flavor_text: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"

name: Exultant Cultist
oracle_text: When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: Amid the gibbering chorus that rose from the drownyard temple, Jace recognized a single word: "Emrakul."

name: Faithbearer Paladin
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text:
"I've seen cathars riding to battle without a hint of fear. Perhaps that is its own sort of madness."
—Esler, Havengul mercenary

name: Falkenrath Reaver
flavor_text:
"Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can."
—Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia

name: Field Creeper
flavor_text: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

name: Fiend Binder
oracle_text: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

name: Fogwalker
oracle_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Fogwalker enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Galvanic Bombardment
oracle_text: Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Geist-powered devices have no shortage of fuel.

name: Gavony Unhallowed
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.
flavor_text:
"We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Graf Rats
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you both own and control Graf Rats and a creature named Midnight Scavengers, exile them, then meld them into Chittering Host.

name: Grapple with the Past
oracle_text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

name: Guardian of Pilgrims
oracle_text: When Guardian of Pilgrims enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Immune to the physical warping caused by Emrakul, geists proved to be some of humanity's most important allies.

name: Ingenious Skaab
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}: Ingenious Skaab gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Heads and shoulders above the rest.

name: Ironclad Slayer
oracle_text: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The best weapon is the one at hand.

name: Ironwright's Cleansing
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Impurities must be pounded out."

name: It of the Horrid Swarm
oracle_text:
Emerge {6}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
When you cast this spell, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

name: Laboratory Brute
oracle_text: When Laboratory Brute enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
flavor_text: It keeps intruders out and experiments in.

name: Lunarch Mantle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."
flavor_text:
"A boon from the angels should never be cast aside."
—Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

name: Make Mischief
oracle_text: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

name: Midnight Scavengers
oracle_text:
When Midnight Scavengers enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
(Melds with Graf Rats.)

name: Olivia's Dragoon
oracle_text: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.

name: Otherworldly Outburst
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
flavor_text: A tiny crack is enough to open the mind to Emrakul.

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: The Somberwald has become a hunting ground for the Dronepack, the group of werewolves that have succumbed to the flesh-twisting power of Emrakul.

name: Primal Druid
oracle_text: When Primal Druid dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "The power of the woods is only ever borrowed."

name: Prophetic Ravings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
flavor_text: "Keep your herons and shrews! You will find nothing in the moon, for the moon is a lie! It has told me so!"

name: Sigardian Priest
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Tap target non-Human creature.
flavor_text: Many whose faith was destroyed by Avacyn turned to the only angel who remained true to humanity.

name: Skirsdag Supplicant
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I can no longer stand by as these Skirsdag infiltrators rot the church from within. Even the Lunarch Council is compromised. What a fool I've been."
—Odric

name: Spectral Reserves
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"My predecessors taught me of duty and commitment. It seems they have more to teach."
—Wendin, veteran cathar

name: Spontaneous Mutation
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

name: Springsage Ritual
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Every evil destroyed is a strike against the enemy."
—Erold, Gatstaf springsage

name: Steadfast Cathar
oracle_text: Whenever Steadfast Cathar attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds."
—Gideon Jura

name: Stensia Banquet
oracle_text:
Stensia Banquet deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of Vampires you control.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"We can't win a war on an empty stomach, can we?"
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Stensia Innkeeper
oracle_text: When Stensia Innkeeper enters the battlefield, tap target land an opponent controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: "The perils of the road, you say? Don't worry. You won't have to face those again."

name: Strange Augmentation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Delirium — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Succumb to Temptation
oracle_text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
flavor_text: "Restraint is for the meek."

name: Swift Spinner
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Its web is woven so tightly that not even geists can avoid capture.

name: Take Inventory
oracle_text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Take Inventory in your graveyard.
flavor_text: A place for everything, and everything in its place.

name: Tattered Haunter
oracle_text:
Flying
Tattered Haunter can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: When the Nebelgast recedes, there are often stragglers.

name: Terrarion
oracle_text:
Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Thermo-Alchemist
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
flavor_text: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

name: Thraben Foulbloods
oracle_text: Delirium — Thraben Foulbloods gets +1/+1 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: The famed hunting hounds of House Cecani continue to prove the quality of their pedigree.

name: Thraben Standard Bearer
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
flavor_text: The uncorrupted rallied under Thalia's leadership and Sigarda's banner.

name: Turn Aside
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor_text:
"There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways."
—Tamiyo

name: Ulvenwald Captive // Ulvenwald Abomination
type_line: Creature — Werewolf Horror // Creature — Eldrazi Werewolf

card_faces.name: Ulvenwald Captive
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Even on a plane as dark as this one, nature will organize a defense against the unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

card_faces.name: Ulvenwald Abomination
card_faces.flavor_text:
"The Eldrazi are all too practiced at twisting natural into unnatural."
—Nissa Revane

name: Wailing Ghoul
oracle_text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Waxing Moon
oracle_text: Transform up to one target Werewolf you control. Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Show them what it means to be the source of nightmares!"
—Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha

name: Weirded Vampire
oracle_text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Emrakul makes apparent those whom she has favored."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Wolfkin Bond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Woodcutter's Grit
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: The magic used by Kessigers is known for its practical applications.

name: Woodland Patrol
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Each had seen friends and family taken by the corruption, so each carried an axe at the other's request.
